Message.Msg: "Yet Ryan and Akin are in the mainstream of the prevailing House Republican view on abortion. Not only did Akin and Ryan co-sponsor legislation redefining rape, Ryan ran for Congress as a strong pro-lifer and has a 100 percent rating from the National Right to Life Committee. “This includes support for the Partial-Birth Abortion Ban Act, the Unborn Victims of Violence Act, the No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act,” the committee notes. Thank you,compliments are rare here, you do alright yourself, I think the message is heavy and dark and ultimately nihilistic, utterly devoid of hope or possibility of a happy ending, but it does give us a glimpse of the dystopian future we face on our present course,and that has the potential to be useful, everyone has to wake up, the World Weald is describing is the dystopian World that is coming, unless we change it! Weald-o-K Your delivery, and competence with language is superb, if I might for a moment take a liberty with etiquette, and speak familiarly !Your posts have energy, Negative I think, But entirely admirable in their own right, proof positive, of the Writer's Bona Fides in the World of people who, "Write things down", for money or fun, it doesn't matter everyone say, yet, I'm sure, it must be satisfying to have someone pay you for what you'd often done just for the fun of it! All the best to you Mr. Weald!, he tooted forlornly on the whistle as the two ships passed in the night. Each master on course to his own destiny. I hope transatlantic fails in his campaign to discredit you Weald,at least for now, you perform a valuable service giving us an advance look at what is incubating just below the surface, just outside our Mainstream recognition horizon, you are probably safe, still, he is a tenacious fellow and he has brought many to the shame and disgrace of having their Yahoo Account cancelled! We all pray he won't turn his attention to us!
